segments.text: Have you heard that new song by the Beastie Boys ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you listen to rap ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not much different from that heavy metal music you like so much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Heavy metal music is a lot different from rap music.You can dance to heavy metal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , you can dance to rap music !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't dance to it . And I know you can't either . Because I've seen you try .
segments.speaker: S2
